name: Tuhanarak
aura: Increases Ally ACC in All Battles by 70.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. 

Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 1 turn. Also places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 1 turn on the ally with the lowest HP.
skills.name: Sun's Kiss
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff and a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns. Also applies a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 2 random debuffs from the target and placing them on all enemies.
skills.name: Radiant Suffering
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Desert Fitness

skills.desc:
Removes 1 random debuff from all allies at the start of each turn. 

Removes 2 random debuffs instead from allies under [Continuous Heal] buffs.
skills.name: Inviolable [P]
